explains: adj. （动物）冬眠的，（似）在深睡的；（植物或芽）休眠的；（火山）暂时不活动的，静止的；（疾病）潜伏期的；（纹章）（动物）卧睡的
wordGroup: dormant volcano 休眠火山；睡火山，休火山
dormant period 潜伏期，垫伏期

sentences.en: During the winter the seeds lie dormant in the soil.
sentences.cn: 冬天种子在土壤中休眠。

sentences.en: The pupae remain dormant in the soil until they emerge as adult moths in the winter.
sentences.cn: 蛹在土壤下休眠，直到冬季才变为成年的蛾飞出来。

sentences.en: And Lechuguilla is pretty much dormant now.
sentences.cn: 而龙舌兰现在几乎处于休眠状态。
